## This is a minimal vignette, to include when testing code in other ways

## Required Packages
```{r, message=FALSE}
  #devtools::load_all()
  library(xgx)
  library(scales)
  library(stringr)
  library(grid)
  library(gridExtra)
  library(knitr)
  library(png)
  library(dplyr)
  library(ggplot2)

  #override masking
  rename = dplyr::rename
  select = dplyr::select

  xgx_plot(data=data.frame(x=c(0,rlnorm(1000,0,1)),y=c(0,rlnorm(1000,0,3))),aes(x=x,y=y)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    xgx_scale_x_log10() + 
    xgx_scale_y_log10()
```
